title: Ticket #1862: tool and other links missing from packaged condor
description: Many of the various condor tools are really links to condor_tool, which switches on argv[0] to do the right thing. In the process of make install, the links are currently being followed, not copied. As a result, our packages are much bigger than they should otherwise be.
remarks:
